sentences.en: Clinically observe the cure effect of gout arthritis treated internally and externally.
sentences.cn: 观察内外兼治痛风性关节炎的临床疗效.

sentences.en: Coordinate APQP new product launch process internally and externally with the customer.
sentences.cn: 发起团队内部及与客户外部联系.

sentences.en: Externally stick on clothes at the chest position without skin contact.
sentences.cn: 外贴于胸口位置之衣服上,无须接触皮肤.

sentences.en: Must be able to communicate very clearly and effectively and externally.
sentences.cn: 必须具备清晰而有效的内、外部沟通能力.

sentences.en: Seek for the Dharma externally, and one falls into the deviant path.
sentences.cn: 所谓的心外求法就叫外道.

sentences.en: The fact is, Hong Kong is very much an externally - oriented economy.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 香港经济主要倚赖对外贸易.

sentences.en: The grate is riddled externally so that there is no dust.
sentences.cn: 炉篦从外部用粗筛筛过以除灰.

sentences.en: The term " externally pressurized bearings " is therefore to be preferred.
sentences.cn: 因此用 “ 外生压轴承 ” 一词更佳.

sentences.en: The ventral nerve cord is covered externally by a peritoneum.
This action externally appears like the discharge of a capacitor.
sentences.cn: 这一作用从外表上看来像电容器的放电现象。
这种条件是从外部强加的.

sentences.en: This medicine is to be applied externally.
Though I am very smooth externally, at bottom I am very passionate.
sentences.cn: 尽管我外表和颜悦色, 心底里也有感情的狂澜.

sentences.en: Vertical grinder belongs to roller grinder by externally force.
sentences.cn: 立式磨煤机属于外加力型辊盘式磨煤机.

sentences.en: Vitamins can be applied externally to the skin.
sentences.cn: 维生素可以外用于皮肤。

words.tran_cn: 外部的；表面的；[药] 外用的；外国的；外面的
走读生；走读医学研究生
给…以外形；使具体化，使客观化

trans.tran_cn: 在（或从）外部，在（或从）外面，外表上
